dict.string: This Info.plist file is the central metadata for the app, both at runtime and during the FAIR process. See https://www.appfair.net for documentation and examples. At a minimum, the Bundle name and Bundle identifier should be configured to match the app fork name.
CFBundleIdentifier should be «app.Abc-Xyz» for the App fork name «Abc-Xyz»
CFBundleName should be «Abc Xyz» for the App fork name «Abc-Xyz»
CFBundleShortVersionString should be a semantic version string that will match the tag name for the release of the app
FairSymbol can be set to a system symbol name for an image to be embossed onto the icon rather than the monogram of the app name
The FairTint property is a 6-character RBG hex string for the base color of the generated icon
This app needs to read local files in order to load user-selected books
This app needs to read and write files in order to…
This app needs to access the network in order to download books
FairUsage must contain descriptive values for each of the entitlement keys enabled in the app's Sandbox.entitlements file
LSApplicationCategoryType must contain a string public.app-category.TOPIC that matches the appfair-TOPIC for app fork
